name: The Spiritless Shaman
description:
Game description

1) A feel-good visual novel from writer Workingdog!
2) Playtime clocks in at roughly 3 hours.
3) Fully voiced by our passionate professional voice actresses!




New features for this version:

*. Images have been scaled up to Full HD (1920x1080)
*. Original sound quality ( 44.1khz 320kbps )
*. A new UI (user interface) just for this PC version


Synopsis

You meet a girl who claims to be a shaman of the spiritual arts.
But what's this now? Since there are no spirits in this world, she can't demonstrate her abilities?
Is she really the shaman she says she is, or is she nothing more than a pathetic little girl with her head in the clouds?
